topics.body: A bit of news: reading up on the 2016 elections and stats and such; Hillary *IS* going to be next president.  To make it short basically nobody political forecast wise comes even fucking close to being able to win against her.  If you're wondering how bad are the odds against anyone against her to summarize if it was Hillary vs everyone she would still win.  It is straight up absurd how much of a lead she has.
